document_data.name: Sibylite
document_data.mainbody: '''Sibylites''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Savras]], the All-Seeing One.
document_data.Activities: They spent much of their time in meditation seeking glimpses of the future.
document_data.Abilities:
In addition to [[divine magic]] [[spell]]s, all sibylites could cast [[Arcane magic|arcane]] spells from the [[divination]] school. Instead of memorizing these spells like a [[wizard]], a sibylite would pray for them.

They gained a number of special powers depending on their advancement including ''[[augury]]'', ''[[clairvoyance]]'', ''[[detect lie]]'', ''[[cure blindness]]'', ''[[true seeing]]'', ''[[magic font]]'', ''[[reflecting pool]]'', and ''[[consequence]]''.

All sibylites eventually became immune to being surprised during combat or sneaked up on. Especially powerful sibylites could automatically perceive a target's true form regardless of any cloaking spells.
document_data.Possessions: Sibylites did not wear [[armor]], but could wield any bludgeoning weapon of their choice.
